title: 整合服务端 报错了 求大神
author: ab8201751
txt_content:
[SEVERE] Encountered an unexpected exception NoClassDefFoundError
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/minecraft/client/multiplayer/WorldClient


这是什么意思啊 求救啊
